basic.description: In this course, students continue developing the lesson-plan skills learned in SMT1043, as they become familiar with exemplary middle-school science curricula. After observing a lesson being taught in a local school-district classroom, students work alone or in pairs to plan and teach three inquiry-based lessons to sixth, seventh, or eighth graders.
basic.subject: SMT
basic.title: Step 2: Inquiry-Based Lesson Design in Science/Mathematics
